title: Our Specialized Teams
subtitle: The Cyber Brains Club at University Center of Naama is organized into specialized teams, each focusing on different aspects of computer science
description: Each team is led by experienced student members who coordinate projects and provide mentorship to newer members. Join the team that matches your interests and skills!

items.title: Programming Team
items.description: Focused on software development and implementing programming projects using various languages and frameworks.

items.title: Database Team
items.description: Oversees the design, development, and management of databases, and implements data storage and query solutions.

items.title: AI Research Team
items.description: Responsible for research and application in AI and machine learning areas, and develops intelligent models and applications.

items.title: Web Development Team
items.description: Organizes frontend and backend web development projects, and builds interactive web applications and websites for the club.

items.title: Cybersecurity Team
items.description: Responsible for assessing and improving data and network security, conducting penetration testing, and developing security protocols.

items.title: Cloud Computing Team
items.description: Manages cloud infrastructure, develops hosting strategies, and implements solutions for cloud services and applications.
